headline: Revvity price target lowered to $110 from $116 at BofA
summary: BofA lowered the firm’s price target on Revvity (RVTY) to $110 from $116 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. The firm is updating its price targets for stocks under its coverage in the Life Sciences & Diagnostic Tools, LSTs, sector, the analyst tells investors. The firm notes LSTs remain under pressure as uncertainty persists with the macro environment and U.S. government policies. Recent weeks, however, have seen some signs of improvement as tariff concerns have cools slightly, the firm adds.
